msg: Add method to create the comparators for a List of Sort object. See MAILBOX-78

author: jleroux
msg: Closes "JmsTopicListener started twice when distributed-cache-clear is active" reported by Martin Kreidenweis at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4296
Simply avoid to start a JMS Listener thread from Job Manager when DCC is on. Then set it back to previous value.
